tool_description:
SingRing API (SRAPI from now on) is a restricted REST service developed to serve SingRing (SR from now on) lyrics, artists and videoinformation to its partners.
The service is based on server side connection between partners server and SRAPI servers and between clients and SRAPI servers.
name: SRAPI 1.0
title: SRAPI 1.0

api_list.name: getAllTags

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

api_list.name: getAllSongs

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

api_list.name: getAllArtists

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

optional_parameters.name: video_proximity
optional_parameters.description: video_proximity=[boolean]. If "true", getAllArtist returns the list of the artists with videos. If "false" or null returns the list of all artists

api_list.name: getVideosByTag

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: id = [int] id is a tag id. you can find all id tags with getAllTags

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

optional_parameters.name: video_proximity
optional_parameters.description: admitted values are 0 , 10, 20, -1. default is 0. -1 = all video_proximity

api_list.name: getAllVideos

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

optional_parameters.name: video_proximity
optional_parameters.description: admitted values are 0 , 10, 20, -1. default is 0. -1 = all video_proximity

api_list.name: getAllAlbums

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

api_list.name: getVideosByTitle

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

optional_parameters.name: video_proximity
optional_parameters.description: admitted values are 0 , 10, 20, -1. default is 0. -1 = all video_proximity

api_list.name: getVideosByArtist

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

optional_parameters.name: video_proximity
optional_parameters.description: admitted values are 0 , 10, 20, -1. default is 0. -1 = all video_proximity

api_list.name: getSongsByAlbum
api_list.description: getSongsByAlbum returns a list of songs of the album specified with the id parameter passed

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

api_list.name: getLatestLyrics
api_list.description: getLatestLyrics return the list oif newest songs list's inserted in the last 7 days from the date passed with string parameter

required_parameters.name: str
required_parameters.description: str=yyyy-mm-dd (maximum 6 days ago. example today= 2013-07-08  value = 2013-07-05)

api_list.name: getSongsByArtist
api_list.description: getSongsByArtist returns a list of songs of the artists specified with the id parameter passed

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

api_list.name: getAlbumsByName
api_list.description: getAlbumsByName returns the list of the albums that match with album title, passed as string parameter

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

api_list.name: getSongsByTag
api_list.description: getSongsBytag returns a list of songs tagged with a specific tag, passed as id parameter

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

api_list.name: getAlbumsByArtist
api_list.description: getAlbumsByArtist.php return the list of the albums of the artist called by id parameter

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

api_list.name: getLyricById
api_list.description: getLyricsByTitle returns all information about the song request by passing the id, except for the information about the credits (you have to request the credits information with a client server call using the SingRing javascript library)

api_list.name: getSongsByTitle
api_list.description: getSongsByTitle returns a list of songs whose titles starts with the string passed with str parameter

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000

api_list.name: getArtistsByName
api_list.description: getArtistsByName returns the list of the artists that match with the string passed as parameter

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: limit=[int] default and max value is 1000
